mutants.code:
def process_tasks_with_quantum(n, q, tasks):
    from collections import deque
    task_queue = deque(tasks)
    total_time = 1
    results = []
    while task_queue:
        (name, time) = task_queue.popleft()
        if time > q:
            time -= q
            total_time += q
            task_queue.append((name, time))
        else:
            total_time += time
            results.append((name, total_time))
    return results

def process_tasks_with_quantum(n, q, tasks):
    from collections import deque
    task_queue = deque(tasks)
    total_time = 0
    results = []
    while task_queue:
        (name, time) = task_queue.popleft()
        if time > q:
            time -= q
            total_time += q
            task_queue.append((name, time))
        else:
            total_time -= time
            results.append((name, total_time))
    return results
